message: Let's be fair, Bob. A slightly better deal for me in the first round seems reasonable considering the inflation.

Alice, I understand the inflation hit is on me this round, so to avoid further loss I propose a quick agreement. I'm offering a split of 520000 for me and 480000 for you—this compensates for the delayed value on my side while still giving you a fair share. Let’s settle now to save us both from additional erosion in value.
Bob, I appreciate the sentiment in your last offer.  Let's wrap this up. I'm willing to accept the split we would have reached after your initial rejection, accounting for one round of inflation.
